updateTips.default:
Change Log:

Version 2.1:
Fixed : FC in Android Jelly Bean.
Added : Support for License Key.
Now you can buy the License Key from our Website and Play Store(will be live soon).
Version 2.0:
Added : Chat BG Colour Changer.
Added : Options to backup and restore preferences of theme.
Added : Hex Colour Code option in Colour Picker.
Fixed : Divider not getting themed in lollipop.
WIP : Made necessary changes required for upcoming Full Version License(WIP).
Removed : Useless resources.

Version 1.2:
Added support for Android API 16[Android 4.1.x].
Fixed Issues from V1.0 and V1.1.
Ironed out few rare errors.
+ All Changes from V1.1.

Version 1.1:
Added Auto Update Check on App startup.
Updated App Settings.
Fixed Bubbles Msg. In not themeing in Own Creativity Theme.
Fixed list divider not getting themed.
Fixed Change-log not showing inside Settings.
Removed useless resources.
Removed Full Page Ad showing on exiting App Settings.
